name: Atiqur Rahman
message: Wishing you all the happiness in the world!
messageData:
🎉 Happy 17th Birthday, Mahinoor! 🎉

I’m so grateful to have you in my life. 💖 Your kindness and laughter brighten every room. 🌟 Seventeen is the perfect age for new adventures and dreams! ✨ Always believe in yourself. 💪

May your year be filled with smiles and unforgettable moments. 🥳

With all my love, Your forever bestie 💕
